long_description: This library implements promises for Lua. You can learn more from the [README](https://github.com/TurkeyMcMac/promisestuff/blob/main/README.md) and from the documentation for the [core](https://github.com/TurkeyMcMac/promisestuff/blob/main/doc/core.md) and [Minetest-specific](https://github.com/TurkeyMcMac/promisestuff/blob/main/doc/minetest.md) APIs.
name: promisestuff
title: Promise Stuff
